phrases.phrase: Update TV episode posts that are missing images or plots
Replace all TV images if option is selected
Exclude TV show title in season episode threads
Allow TV shows to be posted multiple times
Items to show in forum thread list
Enter your API key for The Movie Database

Categories selected in this list can only be used to create forums dedicated to individual TV shows.
Do not select any categories if you do not wish to use this option.

If you are using your own CDN, enter the CDN path here.
Example: http://cdn.yourpath.com/data
DO NOT end the path with a /

To place a redirect link to the main TV thread in all genre limited forums that a TV show can belong to, check this box. Genre limiting must be enabled for this to work
EXAMPLE: A TV show is in these genres: Drama, Science Fiction, Thriller
A member posts the show in the Science Fiction forum.
Redirect links will be placed in the Drama and Thriller forums.

Check this box to exclude the TV show title in the title for episode threads.
This may be needed if tv show names and episode titles exceed the XenForo thread title limit.

Check this box if you want to force any comments entered with a new TV thread to be posted as the second post in the new TV thread.
NOTE: This does not change existing threads. This only affects the first post in a new TV thread.

Select the forums that will be used for TV threads.
SHIFT or CTRL click to select multiple forums.
NOTE: The forums selected here MUST be used exclusively for TV threads. They should not be used for any other type of thread. They MUST NOT be the same forums used for movie threads if you have the TMDb Movie Thread Starter installed.

Enter the ISO 639-1 Language Code that will be used for TV information.
These codes are available at List of ISO 639-1 codes

You may also include a two letter country code in the language selection (en-US, en-GB, pt-PT, pt-BR, etc...).
This is a list of the two letter country codes: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 Country Codes

NOTE: There is no guarantee that the translation to the language selected will be the proper translation. And there is no guarantee there will be a translation of a TV show at The Movie Database. Those are both handled by The Movie Database and not translated by this add-on.

Changing language will NOT change threads already posted. Only new threads will post in the new language.
Select the position for the TV show poster in threads

Check this box to allow normal threads to be created in a TV forum.
NOTE: This only works in main TV Forums. It does not work in TV Season forums.
Check this box to allow a TV show to be posted more than once.

This option is for those that didn't store their images locally before upgrading to XF2, or for those that want to update all of the TV images in their forums, threads and posts. When this box is checked, a cron task will run to replace ALL images for ALL TV forums, threads and posts.
NOTE: This option will reset itself after all images have been replaced.
This option may take a long time to complete. Be patient, it will eventually finish updating.
Select the items to show in the forum thread list
Select the items to be shown in the first post of a TV thread
The default sort order when a new season forum is created is descending. To sort them in ascending order, check this box.
Checking this box will enable manual updates for existing threads that DO NOT contain TV show information. Users must have 'Can add missing TV information' permission set to 'Yes'.

You can limit the type of TV shows posted in each forum to a specific genre. Check this box to enable this option. The genre for each forum is specified in Forums->Nodes. Click on the forum you wish to limit and select the genres you wish to allow in the forum.
Check this box to turn on the TV show rating system.
Check this box to use your own CDN for all poster images.
Options for the TMDb TV thread starter add-on
Can add new episode to TV season
Can add new season to TV show
Can add TV show to category
Add TV info to first post
If you have already rated this show, your current rating is shown

You can limit the TV show type by genre in this forum.
If you select ALL then any TV genre will be allowed.
If you select any other genres then new threads for this forum will be limited to TV shows in those genres.
NOTE: If someone tries to post a TV show in a genre that does not have a node assigned to it, then they will receive an error message stating that the genre is not allowed to be posted. So, if you decide to keep TV genres in separate forums, be sure to either create a forum for every genre listed or create one forum set to accept ALL genres. The ALL genre is the last to be considered for a new thread. That way, if someone tries to post a TV show with a different genre for the node they are posting in, it will be automatically posted in the correct node without an error.
Change thread title to TV show title
All you need to enter is the episode number for this season. (EXAMPLE: 5)
Aired date must be formatted YYYY-MM-DD
TMDb API Key is not valid
When posting a TV episode you must enter both the Season number and Episode number
You did not enter a valid episode number
The episode number is not valid for this TV show
You are trying to post a movie in a TV forum
Genre limiting is enabled and no genre is selected for this forum
The TV show was not found at The Movie Database
TV Information Not Returned from TMDB
That TV show has already been posted
Please enter a valid ISO 3166-1 Country Code
Please enter a valid ISO 639-1 Language Code
TV show information provided by The Movie Database
If you wish to post an episode for this TV show, enter the Season and Episode numbers
TMDb TV show link or TV show ID
Post a new thread or TV show
TMDb TV show link, TV show ID, or thread title
A new poster is not available
Don't have the TMDb Link or ID for your TV show? Go to The Movie Database and look it up.
User has started at least X TV threads
Enter either a youtube video ID or a youtube link
